text: Julião Francisco Gaspar, nicknamed Vermelhinho, (born 28 March 1990) is an Angolan handball player for Interclube and the Angolan national team. He participated at the 2017 World Men's Handball Championship.2017 World Championship roster ==References== Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Angolan male handball players Category:African Games silver medalists for Angola Category:African Games medalists in handball Category:Competitors at the 2015 African Games
title: Julião Gaspar
